name: Markus Engineering Services & ATHENA Institute (2003). Steel Production
description:
This LCI study was commissioned by the ATHENA Sustainable Materials Institute to up-date our original studies of steel production. 

http://www.athenasmi.org/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/1_Steel_Production.pdf
textReference: Cradle-To-Gate LCI: Canadian and US Steel Production by Mill Type. Revised: ATHENA SMI, Feb 2003
